# IBS/IBD/Celiac/SIBO Integrated Management
| Condition cluster | Diagnostic anchor | Treatment ladder |
| --- | --- | --- |
| IBS-C | alarm feature 배제 + 기본 혈액검사 | fiber/PEG -> lubiprostone/linaclotide -> 선택 약제 |
| IBS-D | 감염/셀리악/IBD 배제 | loperamide -> bile acid binder/선택 약제 |
| IBD | 내시경/염증소견 기반 | 5-ASA(UC), flare steroid, 중증 biologic |
| Celiac | tTG-IgA + total IgA -> duodenal biopsy | gluten-free diet, 결핍 보충 |
| SIBO | breath test + 임상상 | rifaximin + 유발요인 교정 |

## IBD quick compare
- UC: continuous colon involvement, mucosal disease, bloody diarrhea.
- Crohn: skip lesion + transmural inflammation, fistula/stricture 위험.

# SIBO Core: Risk, Diagnosis, Treatment
| Axis | High-yield point |
| --- | --- |
| Risk | motility 저하(당뇨/경피증), blind loop/협착, acid suppression, 만성 췌장기능저하 |
| Biochemical clue | B12 감소 + folate 상승 패턴 가능 |
| Test | glucose/lactulose breath test |
| Treatment | rifaximin, 원인 교정 |

- bloating + malabsorption 패턴과 영양결핍 단서가 감별에 중요.

text:
# Acute Abdomen Framework: Appendicitis and SBO
| Category | Primary entities | First decision |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Inflammatory | appendicitis, pseudo-appendicitis | true surgical abdomen vs mimic 감별 |
| Mechanical obstruction | SBO(단순/교액), ileus | strangulation sign 여부 판단 |

## Appendicitis essentials
- 통증 이동(배꼽 -> RLQ)과 국소 압통이 핵심.
- 진단 영상: 성인 CT, 임산부/소아 US 우선(필요시 MRI).
- 천공+농양은 즉시 절제보다 항생제/배액 후 interval approach 고려.
subject: LM_GIT 1 2f746f2986ee80c5bf7bfff60573e7e3

text:
# Pseudo-appendicitis and SBO vs Ileus
| Feature | SBO | Ileus |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Pain | colicky | diffuse discomfort |
| Bowel sound | high-pitched early | reduced/absent |
| Imaging | transition point | diffuse bowel dilation |
| Rectal gas | 감소/소실 | 종종 존재 |

## Mimic clue
- RLQ pain + fever + profuse diarrhea는 Yersinia/Campylobacter ileocecitis 감별 필요.
- SBO에서 fever/tachy/leukocytosis/acidosis/peritoneal sign은 strangulation red flag.

# Rapid Recap: Appendicitis and Obstruction Emergencies
| Vignette | Likely diagnosis | Key action |
| --- | --- | --- |
| pregnancy with shifted RUQ/RLQ pain | appendicitis in pregnancy | US -> MRI sequence |
| RLQ pain + explosive diarrhea | pseudo-appendicitis | supportive/infectious workup |
| prior surgery + colicky pain + high-pitched sounds | SBO | NPO + NG + IV fluid |
| SBO + systemic toxicity/peritoneal signs | strangulated SBO | urgent surgery |
| post-op distension + silent bowel | ileus | conservative/electrolyte correction |

# Lower GI Intro: Hemorrhoids and Diverticular Disease
| Topic | Hallmark |
| --- | --- |
| Internal hemorrhoid | painless bright-red bleeding above dentate line |
| External hemorrhoid | painful lesion below dentate line |
| Diverticulosis | painless hematochezia |
| Diverticulitis | LLQ pain + fever + leukocytosis |

- 치료 결정은 "scope vs surgery vs conservative" 분기 기준으로 진행.

text:
# Hemorrhoid and Diverticulitis Management Details
| Entity | Key management |
| --- | --- |
| Internal hemorrhoid | lifestyle -> rubber band ligation -> surgery |
| Thrombosed external (<72h severe pain) | excision 고려 |
| Diverticulitis uncomplicated | bowel rest + antibiotics, 회복 후 colonoscopy |
| Diverticulitis with large abscess | CT-guided drainage + antibiotics |

- 급성 diverticulitis 시기에는 colonoscopy 금기(perforation risk).
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Angiodysplasia, Colovesical Fistula, Toxic Megacolon, Ogilvie
| Condition | Signature clue | Core action |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Heyde syndrome | AS + GI bleed + acquired vWF defect | valve intervention 고려 |
| Colovesical fistula | pneumaturia/fecaluria/recurrent UTI | CT 기반 진단 + 원인수술 평가 |
| Toxic megacolon | toxic signs + colonic dilation >6cm | no scope, bowel rest/IV therapy/surgical backup |
| Ogilvie syndrome | pseudo-obstruction in ill/post-op | conservative -> neostigmine -> decompression |

- toxic megacolon에서는 항운동제/오피오이드 회피 필수.
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Toxic Megacolon and Ogilvie Protocol
| Step | Toxic megacolon | Ogilvie |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Diagnosis | systemic toxicity + colon >6cm | mechanical obstruction 배제 후 pseudo-obstruction |
| Immediate care | NPO/NG/IV fluid/Abx, 원인질환 치료 | NPO/rectal tube/electrolyte correction |
| Escalation | failure/perforation 시 colectomy | neostigmine(atrophine 준비), 내시경 감압 |

- Both conditions require 빠른 악화 모니터링과 천공 예방.
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Rapid Recap: Lower GI Mechanical/Anal Emergencies
| Scenario | Diagnosis | Priority |
| --- | --- | --- |
| painless hematochezia, older patient | diverticulosis/angiodysplasia | hemodynamic stabilization + localization |
| LLQ pain + fever | diverticulitis | CT, 급성기 scope 금지 |
| UC flare + toxic dilation | toxic megacolon | no colonoscopy, ICU-level care |
| post-op diffuse colonic dilation no block | Ogilvie | conservative then neostigmine |
| severe thrombosed external hemorrhoid <72h | thrombosed external hemorrhoid | excision relief |

- 금기상황(acute scope 금지, 지사제 금지)을 지키는 것이 핵심.
subject: LM_GIT2 2f946f2986ee80f58743c80a29f3f081

text:
# Volvulus, Fissure, Fistula, and Anorectal Infection
| Problem | Hallmark clue | Treatment direction |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Sigmoid volvulus | elderly + coffee-bean + distension | endoscopic decompression 후 elective surgery |
| Cecal volvulus | younger/mobile cecum | immediate surgery |
| Anal fissure | tearing pain with defecation | stool softening + topical vasodilator, refractory LIS |
| Anorectal abscess/fistula | purulent drainage/tract | I&D or fistulotomy, 깊으면 OR imaging |

- 측면 fissure는 Crohn/HIV/TB 등 이차 원인 감별 필요.
- Crohn-related fistula는 sphincter-preserving strategy 우선.
